projects.title: Hybrid Communication System for Local and Cloud Networks
description: Developed a hybrid peer-to-peer communication system that integrates local networks (Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, LAN) with cloud infrastructure to optimize messaging and file transfer efficiency.
Enabled direct device-to-device communication to reduce ISP dependency, minimize latency, and lower data costs.
Implemented Go-Back-N ARQ for reliable data transmission, SQLite for persistent storage, and Flask-SocketIO for cloud-based fallback communication.
Ensured secure communication across all modes using End-to-End Encryption (E2EE) with a Double Ratchet-inspired protocol.
features: Real-time messaging and file sharing across LAN, WAN, and offline modes
Automatic peer discovery using UDP broadcasts and mDNS
Seamless switching between local peer-to-peer and cloud-based communication
End-to-End Encryption with secure key exchange and forward secrecy
Offline queuing and deferred delivery using SQLite for reliability
Lightweight interface with scalable and low-latency performance

projects.title: AI-Powered Smart Glasses for Glaucoma Detection
description: Smart glasses built with a high-speed camera and sensors using ESP32/SDM microcontroller to measure intraocular pressure (IOP) and cup-to-disc ratio.
Sensor data is sent to a TensorFlow-based ML model, and predictions are used by the Gemini API for automated report generation.
User interface developed using Next.js and CSS, with Flask and TensorFlow handling backend processing and model inference.
features: Real-time IOP measurement
AI-powered glaucoma detection
Automated report generation
Mobile-responsive web interface

projects.title: College Match
description: Developed a web app using Django for KCET counseling aspirants, designed to produce a personalized list of colleges.
The data of previous year's cutoffs, used to recommend colleges, is stored in SQLite.
The app aims to reduce the need for personal counselors by allowing current college students to interact with users and provide information about their college.
features: Personalized college recommendations based on KCET scores
Interactive platform for student-counselor communication
Historical cutoff data analysis

projects.title: Water Monitoring System
description: Developed a Water Monitoring System leveraging IoT technologies to optimize water usage and mitigate wastage, using Raspberry Pi, water flow sensors, and Twilio.
It sends instant alerts via Twilio's communication API to notify users about abnormal water usage or potential issues.
The project integrates Python-based visualization tools and the ThingSpeak platform to provide actionable insights and track water consumption trends.
features: Real-time water flow measurement and monitoring
Automatic alerts for abnormal or excess water usage
Data logging and visualization on ThingSpeak platform
Web interface built with Django for monitoring and reports
Email and SMS notifications using Twilio and Smtplib
